about_the_game:
Originally released in the early 1990s, Super Kick Off was an enhanced version of Kick Off developed for a variety of consoles. Now, relive those days in this remastered emulated version.

Contains the versions developed for Nintendo Game Boy, Nintendo Super NES, Sega Game Gear, Sega Master System, and Sega Mega Drive.

Includes 40 teams (16 national and 24 club), with the ability to edit everything from the team name and kit designs to the names and appearances of the players. Lead your team to victory in a variety of game modes, from friendlies, to leagues and cups at every level from domestic to international.


This enhanced version introduces a number of modern features to this retro classic, including:

  • Saving/loading the game at any point
  • Support for most modern game controllers
  • Full control remapping
  • Image scaling and smoothing options
detailed_description:
Originally released in the early 1990s, Super Kick Off was an enhanced version of Kick Off developed for a variety of consoles. Now, relive those days in this remastered emulated version.

Contains the versions developed for Nintendo Game Boy, Nintendo Super NES, Sega Game Gear, Sega Master System, and Sega Mega Drive.

Includes 40 teams (16 national and 24 club), with the ability to edit everything from the team name and kit designs to the names and appearances of the players. Lead your team to victory in a variety of game modes, from friendlies, to leagues and cups at every level from domestic to international.


This enhanced version introduces a number of modern features to this retro classic, including:

  • Saving/loading the game at any point
  • Support for most modern game controllers
  • Full control remapping
  • Image scaling and smoothing options
legal_notice: "Kick Off" is a registered trademark of Firebrand Games Ltd.
name: Super Kick Off (Game Boy/Game Gear/Master System/Mega Drive/SNES)

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Super Kick Off (Game Boy/Game Gear/Master System/Mega Drive/SNES)

reviews:
“An English footy game for the Master System which has every feature you could possibly ask for. Overhead views of the pitch, great graphics and intelligent gameplay. Here we go, here we go, here we go...”
100% – Sega Power (December 1993) (Sega Master System version)

“This Master System classic works brilliantly on the Game Gear and has all the features of its bigger counterpart. Excellent footy gameplay and loads of definable options. Great graphics too. A must buy!”
100% – Sega Power (September 1992) (Sega Game Gear version)

“The best football game going, and one which every Megadrive owner, regardless of their interest in the sport, should leap out and purchase.”
95% – Mean Machines (February 1993) (Sega Mega Drive version)
short_description: Experience the thrill of the beautiful game in this collection of editions of the acclaimed 'Kick Off' series developed for home and handheld consoles in the early 1990s. Includes 40 fully-customizable teams, and a variety of game modes, from friendlies to leagues to international cups.
